Myelin Imaging
================================================
MTSAT
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Magnetization Transfer with T1 compensation

MWF
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Myelin Water Fraction from T2 relaxometry

Quantitative Magnetization Transfer
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SIRFSE
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Inverstion Recovery Fast Spin-Echo

SPGR
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Spoiled-Gradient-Echo

bSSFP
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
balanced SSFP
